official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to include National Weather Service Employees and National Environmental Satellite, and Data Information Service (NESDIS) within the immediate retirement provisions applicable to certain employees engaged in hazardous occupations.

summary.text: Revises civil service immediate retirement provisions applicable to law enforcement officers and firefighters by: (1) including National Weather Service and National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service employees within such provisions; and (2) providing for an annuity, except for removal on misconduct or delinquency charges, if retirement contributions for Government service were paid to the Federal retirement fund.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to include National Weather Service Employees and National Environmental Satellite, and Data Information Service (NESDIS) within the immediate retirement provisions applicable to certain employees engaged in hazardous occupations.
